nodes.text: Keldooine Starshipwrights was a company with a starship repair bay on Keldooine, a world on the edge of the Hutt Space region of the Outer Rim Territories. At some point prior to or during 3 ABY, the criminal majordomo Bib Fortuna took the crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure's starship, Star Jewel, to be repaired at the starshipwrights after the vessel was superficially damaged in an attempted shipjacking on the world of Nar Haaska. Fortuna, who considered the Keldooine Starshipwrights a decent repair bay, left the book known as the Smuggler's Guide in the repair bay's waiting room, where it was discovered and taken by the mercenary Saponza.
Keldooine Starshipwrights was created by author Daniel Wallace for his 2018 reference book, Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide.
